statements: DELETE FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE program_id = 100 AND audience_size > 50000;
DELETE FROM tv_program_engagement WHERE engagement_score < 7.5 OR program_name = 'News Show';
DELETE FROM Social_Media_Data WHERE post_id = 100 AND platform = 'Twitter';
DELETE FROM TV_Programs WHERE program_id = 101 AND genre = 'Comedy';
DELETE FROM tv_programs WHERE genre = 'Comedy' AND release_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Social_Media_Stats WHERE program_id = 5 AND likes > 1000;
DELETE FROM Ad_Revenue WHERE ad_type = 'Sponsored' AND ad_revenue < 500.00;
DELETE FROM viewership_data WHERE viewer_id = 123 AND program_id = 456;
